food.title: Butter Chicken
food.description: Butter chicken, also known as Murgh Makhani, is a beloved North Indian dish. It features tender marinated chicken cooked in a creamy tomato sauce enriched with butter and a blend of aromatic spices. This indulgent and flavorful dish is often served with naan or rice, offering a perfect balance of richness and comfort in every bite.

food.title: Ramen
food.description: Ramen is a Japanese noodle dish renowned for its savory broth and springy wheat noodles. This iconic dish typically includes ingredients such as sliced pork, soft-boiled eggs, scallions, and seaweed. The broth can range from soy sauce-based (shoyu) to miso, tonkotsu (pork bone), or shio (salt-based), each offering a unique and satisfying flavor profile. Ramen is a comfort food favorite, known for its soul-warming appeal and diverse regional variations.

food.title: Pho
food.description: Pho is a Vietnamese noodle soup known for its fragrant broth, rice noodles, and tender meat slices, usually beef or chicken. Garnished with fresh herbs and condiments, it offers a harmonious and comforting taste experience, symbolizing Vietnamese cuisine's depth of flavor and popularity worldwide.
